com.sap.cloud.sdk.cloudplatform.servlet.response

Class AbstractExceptionMapper<ClassT extends AbstractExceptionMapper<ClassT>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sap.cloud.sdk.cloudplatform.servlet.response.AbstractExceptionMapper<ClassT>
  • Type Parameters:
    ClassT - The type of the implementing class.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    JaxRsExceptionMapper, SpringExceptionMapper

    public abstract class AbstractExceptionMapper<ClassT extends AbstractExceptionMapper<ClassT>>
extends Object
    Base class to be used by different the exception handling of different frameworks.

    Provides different methods to modify the underlying Exception mapping.

      • withMapper

        public <ThrowableT extends Throwable & WithErrorResponse> ClassT withMapper(ResponseMapper<ThrowableT> responseMapper,
                                                                            LogLevel logLevel)
        Adds the given ResponseMapper for the Throwable specified insider the mapper. Also adds a custom LogLevel used to server-side log any Throwable of the specified type.
        Type Parameters:
        ThrowableT - The type of the exception to be handled.
        Parameters:
        responseMapper - The mapper to add.
        logLevel - The LogLevel to use for server-side logging of the Throwable.
        Returns:
        this
